alert.note: Alert for Baker; Northern Columbia; Southern Columbia; Union (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 21 at 12:45PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Baker, Union and southeastern Columbia Counties through 115 PM EDT... At 1245 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Five Points to Providence. Movement was northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lake City, Lake Butler, Palestine Community, Upland Pines, Groves, Providence, Five Points, Watertown, Lulu and Olustee. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Baker; Northern Columbia; Southern Columbia; Union
